original: According to Wyatt Ernell, Justin Waye owed gold to a criminal nicknamed the Eyetaker. Justin owned a set of lockpicking and safe-cracking tools that could disable mundane and magical locks. He was planning to break into the Refinery Building, then use his safe-cracking skills to rob the safe in Dracogen’s office.
translation: 怀亚特·埃内尔作证称，贾斯汀·维耶欠了一个外号“夺眼者”的凶犯金子。贾斯汀持有一套撬锁工具，对普通的锁和附魔锁都有效。他原计划入侵精炼厂，用自己的撬锁技巧洗劫德拉科根办公室里的保险箱。
